Name: Edge of Dreams
About the game: Edge of Dreams is a first person action with roguelike elements. You are the lone survivor in this strange space station. Shoot, explore, kill guards, create builds from items and skills, DIE, and repeat. FEATURES: ACTION with elements of roguelike. Unlock new CLASSES , each with their own ABILITIES . RANDOM GENERATED locations for EXPLORE and ACTION . SKILL system for REPLAYABILITY and FUN play. Unlock over 50 MODULES , that give different effects. Use ARTEFACTS system for change game RULES .
